heading: HR00033
0: RESOLUTION CONDEMNING, IN THE STRONGEST TERMS POSSIBLE, THE BOMBING AT THE HEADQUARTERS OF THE FIRST BATTALION COMBAT TEAM OF THE PHILIPPINE ARMY, ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES, IN BARANGAY KAJATIAN, MUNICIPALITY OF INDANAN, PROVINCE OF SULU, EXTENDING OUR DEEPEST SYMPATHY TO THE FAMILIES OF THE INNOCENT VICTIMS, AND URGING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP) TO CONDUCT A THOROUGH INVESTIGATION, AND FILE APPROPRIATE CHARGES AGAINST THE PERPETRATORS OF THE DASTARDLY ACT
principal-authors: TAN, SHERNEE A.; TAN, SAMIER A.;
status: Pending with the Committee on NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY since 2019-07-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00033
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONDEMNING, IN THE STRONGEST TERMS POSSIBLE, THE BOMBING AT THE HEADQUARTERS OF THE FIRST BATTALION COMBAT TEAM OF THE PHILIPPINE ARMY, ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES, IN BARANGAY KAJATIAN, MUNICIPALITY OF INDANAN, PROVINCE OF SULU, EXTENDING OUR DEEPEST SYMPATHY TO THE FAMILIES OF THE INNOCENT VICTIMS, AND URGING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP) TO CONDUCT A THOROUGH INVESTIGATION, AND FILE APPROPRIATE CHARGES AGAINST THE PERPETRATORS OF THE DASTARDLY ACT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, SHERNEE A., TAN, SAMIER A.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-03
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY ON 2019-07-24
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY
